review: Absolutely great!!!  Can't complain about it.  It's so much better than hooking my laptop up to the tv to view netflix and you tube. Also the picture is fuller and better looking when using the firestick than when i am just using my laptop. Also I already have netflix and am going to keep the amazon prime as well, it has many movies and tv shows that netflix doesnt have.  Will keep them both.
